graph LR
   A[fa:fa-car Characteristics of the car]
   B[fa:fa-tag Offer price]
   C(fa:fa-coins Relative price)
   D(fa:fa-calendar-check Time of sale)
   E[fa:fa-chart-line Economic environment]

   A -->|Q0| C
   A -->|Q2| D
   B -->|Q0| C
   D -->|Q1| C
   C -->|Q1| D
